duplex.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a type of house that is divided into two parts, so that it has two separate homes in it
duplex.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a house divided into two homes
duplex.translation[1].definitions[1].def: when information is sent along a wire in both directions at once
duplex.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Users of videoconferencing need a good sound card with full duplex sound capabilities.
